getHeldItem() - Method in class Player
This method is called by the World class so it knows which item, if any, to have displayed in the panel down the bottom right of the screen.

getPlayerPos(Enemy[]) - Method in class Player
Cycles through all the enemies, adding one to the current player rank if that enemy has a lower y-coordinate than the player.
